name: Space Invaders (itch) (Chris RM)
description:
Space Invaders take the planet!. Do not allow it!. Destroy 'em all before it is too late!. 

If you haven't played this classic space shooter game before, now it's the time!. I made this game like the arcade version to show "modern" kids the real deal. 

You can now revive the cool old times with this game and taking it with you anywhere you want to show your friends.

This game is endless. You can play until you run out of lives.

I wonder how much you can score in this game?!. ;D
